Title: Club Invite
Text: Hey @^I'm going to the club later tonight at 11pm.^I'd love it if you came with me.^Just me and you.^-Nikolai

Title: Marketpalooza
Text: @^Join us fall first for our very first Marketpalooza, the event benefits charity!^-Nikolai

Title: Dinner With Nikolai
Text: @,^You should join me for dinner at the saloon tonight, I'll be around at 5pm.^-Nikolai

Title: Honey From Nikolai
Text: @,^I've been working on new kinds of honey and I wanted to give you a sample.^Hope you enjoy it!^-Nikolai

Title: Still Recipe
Text: @^I found this weird egg and thought of you.^Take care of it.^-Nikolai
